member.name: T:Communications.Hubs.AlarmHub
member.summary: WebSocket Alarm hub for real-time communication.

member.name: M:Communications.Hubs.AlarmHub.Send(System.Guid)
member.summary: Sends the message with alarm to client.
member.param: The ID(guid) of the client that accesses the method.

member.name: M:Communications.Hubs.AlarmHub.SendAll
member.summary: Sends the message with alarms to all clients.

member.name: T:Communications.Hubs.NotificationHub
member.summary: WebSocket Notify hub for real-time communication.

member.name: M:Communications.Hubs.NotificationHub.Send(System.Guid)
member.summary: Sends the message with notification to client.
member.param: The ID(guid) of the client that accesses the method.

member.name: M:Communications.Hubs.NotificationHub.SendAll
member.summary: Sends the message with notification to all clients.
